term.title: Geiger–Muller counter tube

item.text: A counter tube operated under such conditions that the magnitude of each pulse is independent of the amount of energy deposited in it.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1538 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
